fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Summon numerous frogs at someone's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The frogs are so annoying that the target will be directed to a completely random, non-Coven target, unless this target is Coven.
- Everyone who attempts to visit the target will also be redirected to a completely random non-Coven target. Coven is also immune to this.
- Anyone redirected because of you will not know who they were redirected to.
- With the Necronomicon, the frogs become poisonous. Everyone who is redirected because of you will be poisoned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Coven.
